system.description: You won't like them when they're angry.
system.trigger: The character is harmed by an attack.
system.effect: The character becomes angry and uses that anger to increase their strength. For every 10 points of Focus they spend, they add +15 to their Melee damage bonus and lose -2 from their Logic- and subsequently their Logic defense. While using this power, they cannot use any other powers that require concentration.
